essays.title: The Centaur Model
essays.concept: Humans and AI combining to form a superior entity, like chess centaurs.

essays.title: Cognitive Offloading
essays.concept: Using AI as an external hard drive for the brain, freeing up RAM for creativity.

essays.title: The Prompt as Code
essays.concept: Natural language becoming the new syntax for programming reality.

essays.title: Semantic Space
essays.concept: Visualizing high-dimensional vector space as a physical landscape we explore.

essays.title: The Hallucination Feature
essays.concept: Why AI errors are actually the source of its creativity, similar to human dreaming.

essays.title: Recursive Self-Improvement
essays.concept: The loop of AI building better AI, visualized as an infinite staircase.

essays.title: The Alignment Problem
essays.concept: The difficulty of specifying goals, illustrated by the King Midas myth.

essays.title: The Black Box
essays.concept: We don't know how deep learning works, looking into the abyss.

essays.title: Synthetic Data
essays.concept: AI learning from AI-generated content, a closed loop ecosystem.

essays.title: The Post-Turing World
essays.concept: A world where we can't distinguish human from machine, and why it doesn't matter.
